extensions.html#dom-gamepad-hand.summary: The hand read-only property of the Gamepad interface returns an enum defining what hand the controller is being held in, or is most likely to be held in.

firefox.notes: The flag is enabled by default in Firefox Nightly and Beta, versions 55 and above.

extensions.html#dom-gamepad-hand.title: Gamepad.hand

extensions.html#dom-gamepadhapticactuato.summary: The pulse() method of the GamepadHapticActuator interface makes the hardware pulse at a certain intensity for a specified duration.

firefox.notes: The flag is enabled by default in Firefox Nightly and Beta, versions 55 and above.

extensions.html#dom-gamepadhapticactuato.title: GamepadHapticActuator.pulse()

extensions.html#dom-gamepadhapticactuato.summary: The type read-only property of the GamepadHapticActuator interface returns an enum representing the type of the haptic hardware.

firefox.notes: The flag is enabled by default in Firefox Nightly and Beta, versions 55 and above.

extensions.html#dom-gamepadhapticactuato.title: GamepadHapticActuator.type

extensions.html#dom-gamepadpose-angulara.summary: The angularAcceleration read-only property of the GamepadPose interface returns an array representing the angular acceleration vector of the Gamepad, in meters per second per second.

firefox.notes: The flag is enabled by default in Firefox Nightly and Beta, versions 55 and above.

extensions.html#dom-gamepadpose-angulara.title: GamepadPose.angularAcceleration

extensions.html#dom-gamepadpose-angularv.summary: The angularVelocity read-only property of the GamepadPose interface returns an array representing the angular velocity vector of the Gamepad, in radians per second.

firefox.notes: The flag is enabled by default in Firefox Nightly and Beta, versions 55 and above.

extensions.html#dom-gamepadpose-angularv.title: GamepadPose.angularVelocity

extensions.html#dom-gamepadpose-hasorien.summary: The hasOrientation read-only property of the GamepadPose interface returns a Boolean stating whether the Gamepad can track and return orientation information.

firefox.notes: The flag is enabled by default in Firefox Nightly and Beta, versions 55 and above.

extensions.html#dom-gamepadpose-hasorien.title: GamepadPose.hasOrientation

extensions.html#dom-gamepadpose-hasposit.summary: The hasPosition read-only property of the GamepadPose interface returns a Boolean stating whether the Gamepad can track and return position information.

firefox.notes: The flag is enabled by default in Firefox Nightly and Beta, versions 55 and above.

extensions.html#dom-gamepadpose-hasposit.title: GamepadPose.hasPosition

extensions.html#dom-gamepadpose-linearac.summary: The linearAcceleration read-only property of the GamepadPose interface returns an array representing the linear acceleration vector of the Gamepad, in meters per second per second.

firefox.notes: The flag is enabled by default in Firefox Nightly and Beta, versions 55 and above.

extensions.html#dom-gamepadpose-linearac.title: GamepadPose.linearAcceleration

extensions.html#dom-gamepadpose-linearve.summary: The linearVelocity read-only property of the GamepadPose interface returns an array representing the linear velocity vector of the Gamepad, in meters per second.

firefox.notes: The flag is enabled by default in Firefox Nightly and Beta, versions 55 and above.

extensions.html#dom-gamepadpose-linearve.title: GamepadPose.linearVelocity

extensions.html#dom-gamepadpose-orientat.summary: The orientation read-only property of the GamepadPose interface returns the orientation of the Gamepad, as a quarternion value.

firefox.notes: The flag is enabled by default in Firefox Nightly and Beta, versions 55 and above.

extensions.html#dom-gamepadpose-orientat.title: GamepadPose.orientation

extensions.html#dom-gamepadpose-position.summary: The position read-only property of the GamepadPose interface returns the position of the Gamepad as a 3D vector.

firefox.notes: The flag is enabled by default in Firefox Nightly and Beta, versions 55 and above.

extensions.html#dom-gamepadpose-position.title: GamepadPose.position

extensions.html#gamepadhapticactuator-in.summary: The GamepadHapticActuator interface of the Gamepad API represents hardware in the controller designed to provide haptic feedback to the user (if available), most commonly vibration hardware.

firefox.notes: The flag is enabled by default in Firefox Nightly and Beta, versions 55 and above.

extensions.html#gamepadhapticactuator-in.title: GamepadHapticActuator

extensions.html#gamepadpose-interface.summary: The GamepadPose interface of the Gamepad API represents the pose of a WebVR controller at a given timestamp (which includes orientation, position, velocity, and acceleration information.)

firefox.notes: The flag is enabled by default in Firefox Nightly and Beta, versions 55 and above.

extensions.html#gamepadpose-interface.title: GamepadPose

extensions.html#partial-gamepad-interfac.summary: The Gamepad interface of the Gamepad API defines an individual gamepad or other controller, allowing access to information such as button presses, axis positions, and id.
extensions.html#partial-gamepad-interfac.title: Gamepad

extensions.html#partial-gamepad-interfac.summary: The hapticActuators read-only property of the Gamepad interface returns an array containing GamepadHapticActuator objects, each of which represents haptic feedback hardware available on the controller.

firefox.notes: The flag is enabled by default in Firefox Nightly and Beta, versions 55 and above.

extensions.html#partial-gamepad-interfac.title: Gamepad.hapticActuators

extensions.html#partial-gamepad-interfac.summary: The pose read-only property of the Gamepad interface returns a GamepadPose object representing the pose information associated with a WebVR controller (e.g. its position and orientation in 3D space).

firefox.notes: The flag is enabled by default in Firefox Nightly and Beta, versions 55 and above.

extensions.html#partial-gamepad-interfac.title: Gamepad.pose

gamepad-interface.summary: The Gamepad interface of the Gamepad API defines an individual gamepad or other controller, allowing access to information such as button presses, axis positions, and id.
gamepad-interface.title: Gamepad

gamepadbutton-interface.summary: The GamepadButton interface defines an individual button of a gamepad or other controller, allowing access to the current state of different types of buttons available on the control device.
gamepadbutton-interface.title: GamepadButton

gamepadevent-interface.summary: The GamepadEvent interface of the Gamepad API contains references to gamepads connected to the system, which is what the gamepad events Window.gamepadconnected and Window.gamepaddisconnected are fired in response to.
gamepadevent-interface.title: GamepadEvent

widl-Gamepad-axes.summary: The Gamepad.axes property of the Gamepad interface returns an array representing the controls with axes present on the device (e.g. analog thumb sticks).-
widl-Gamepad-axes.title: Gamepad.axes

widl-Gamepad-buttons.summary: The Gamepad.buttons property of the Gamepad interface returns an array of gamepadButton objects representing the buttons present on the device.
widl-Gamepad-buttons.title: Gamepad.buttons

widl-Gamepad-connected.summary: The Gamepad.connected property of the Gamepad interface returns a boolean indicating whether the gamepad is still connected to the system.
widl-Gamepad-connected.title: Gamepad.connected

widl-Gamepad-id.summary: The Gamepad.id property of the Gamepad interface returns a string containing some information about the controller.
widl-Gamepad-id.title: Gamepad.id

widl-Gamepad-index.summary: The Gamepad.index property of the Gamepad interface returns an integer that is auto-incremented to be unique for each device currently connected to the system.
widl-Gamepad-index.title: Gamepad.index

widl-Gamepad-mapping.summary: The Gamepad.mapping property of the Gamepad interface returns a string indicating whether the browser has remapped the controls on the device to a known layout.
widl-Gamepad-mapping.title: Gamepad.mapping

widl-Gamepad-timestamp.summary: The Gamepad.timestamp property of the Gamepad interface returns a DOMHighResTimeStamp representing the last time the data for this gamepad was updated.
widl-Gamepad-timestamp.title: Gamepad.timestamp

widl-GamepadButton-pressed.summary: The GamepadButton.pressed property of the GamepadButton interface returns a boolean indicating whether the button is currently pressed (true) or unpressed (false).
widl-GamepadButton-pressed.title: GamepadButton.pressed

widl-GamepadButton-value.summary: The GamepadButton.value property of the GamepadButton interface returns a double value used to represent the current state of analog buttons on many modern gamepads, such as the triggers.
widl-GamepadButton-value.title: GamepadButton.value

widl-GamepadEvent-gamepad.summary: The GamepadEvent.gamepad property of the GamepadEvent interface returns a Gamepad object, providing access to the associated gamepad data for fired gamepadconnected and gamepaddisconnected events.
widl-GamepadEvent-gamepad.title: GamepadEvent.gamepad
